description:
Winter Race in Car Lada Taz
Winter Racing in cars Lada Bowie - Love to manage Russian cars? Want to learn how to keep the road car Russian winter on summer tires directly from the saloon cars? Everyone loves to drift in Russian undervalued basin. Try it and you. Some cars are tuning Be careful to drift in the snow. Friends appreciate if you would bowl Priorka phone! Play with the view from the cockpit, do not forget to make before the race!
This simulator joke you will like it!
The game is completely free and does not require an internet connection.
Thanks for playing with us, leave us your feedback and we will consider them in future updates! If you enjoy the game, we introduce even more Russian-made machine traffic and damage to real cars!
